description:
Celine is drunk and spreads her pollen, making Saki and the others fall for Rito. Rito sets out to buy groceries and runs into Misa. After she takes him around town, he ends up not accomplishing any tasks. Momo mistakes an innocent message for something sexual and after a series of misunderstandings, Yui ends up with a nude photo of Lala.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kafun Denshin / Onnanoko no Kimochi / Dokidoki Mail
Pollen Telepathy / A Girl`s Feelings / Heart-Throbbing Email
Pollinisation / Les sentiments féminins / SMS palpitants
花粉伝心 / オンナノコノキモチ / ドキドキ☆メール
